title: HAEOF Women's 2025 Summer Bodycon Midi Dress Casual Crewneck Sleeveless Ribbed Knit Back Slit Vacation Party Dresses
description: This summer midi dress is made of skin-friendly, lightweight, breathable, soft and stretchy high-quality fabric, will bring you ultimate soft and comfortable wearing experience and make you look slimmer and more charming, easy to dress up or down for formal or casual occations.

The sleeveless dress for spring and summer features stylish texture, classic ribbed knit design, bodycon slim fit, crewneck, solid color and sexy slit in backside. This bodycon summer dress will perfectly show off and modify body curve, emphasize the beauty and charm of the individual lady, really a must-have sweater dress in your closet, you can't miss!

This midi dress fits for any occations and Never Out Of Fashion. You can wear this knit dress for daily life, office, work, travel, vacation, dating, party and so on. It's easy to pair the dress with different spring / summer / fall / winter outfits, also can be a nice gift for ladies for Birthday / Valentine's Day / Anniversary / Thanksgiving Day / Christmas / New Year.
SIZE INFORMATION: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18. The dress is slim fit and the material is high strechy, please check the size chart before ordering.
CARE: Hand wash / machine wash in in laundry bag with similar color at low temperature, do not bleach, and hang to dry.
